scripts.build: sass scss/main.scss public/css/main.css && uglifycss public/css/main.css > public/css/main.min.css && sass scss/index.scss public/css/index.css && uglifycss public/css/index.css > public/css/index.min.css
scripts.start:docker: docker stop mncs-controlboard-dev; docker rm --force mncs-controlboard-dev; docker rmi mncscontrolboard:dev; yarn build:docker && docker run --name=mncs-controlboard-dev -d -p 9000:80 mncscontrolboard:dev
